column6: IF LOOKS COULD KILL PART 5 One of them's frozen solid, the other is a pile of blue goo! They'll need each other to survive -- and it might involve exchanging bodily fluids!   But even if they save each other, they still have to save the world from -- the LIGHTMASTER?  No, we're not kidding...
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Brooks | inker:Udon Comics | writer:Fabian Nicieza | penciller:Patrick Zircher
